code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Context}from"../index";import{Button,Container,Nav,Navbar,NavLink}from"react-bootstrap";import{LOGIN_ROUTE,SETTINGS_ROUTE,SHIFTS_ROUTE,WORKERS_ROUTE}from"../utils/consts";import{observer}from"mobx-react-lite";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var NavBar=observer(function(){var _useContext=useContext(Context),user=_useContext.user;var navigate=useNavigate();var logOut=function logOut(){user.setUser({});user.setIsAuth(false);localStorage.removeItem('token');navigate(LOGIN_ROUTE);};var toShifts=function toShifts(){navigate(SHIFTS_ROUTE);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{bg:"dark",variant:"dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{style:{color:"white"},to:SHIFTS_ROUTE,children:"Job Life"}),user._isAuth?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"ml-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",className:"me-2",onClick:function onClick(){return toShifts();},children:"Shifts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",className:"me-2",onClick:function onClick(){return navigate(WORKERS_ROUTE);},children:"Workers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",className:"me-2",onClick:function onClick(){return navigate(SETTINGS_ROUTE);},children:"Opttions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",onClick:function onClick(){return logOut();},children:"Exit"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{className:"ml-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",onClick:function onClick(){return navigate(LOGIN_ROUTE);},children:"Authorization"})})]})});});export default NavBar;
